Body:
X, Y, Z = np.array(np.meshgrid(np.linspace(0, 1, 50), np.linspace(0, 1, 50),
    np.linspace(0, 1, 50))).reshape(3, -1)
class p(object):
    pass
points = p()
for name, coord in zip(['X', 'Y', 'Z'], [X, Y, Z]):
    setattr(points, name, coord)
line = lineMask(0.5, 1.0, coordinates='X')
line2 = lineMask(0.5, 1.0)
line3 = lineMask(-0.001, 0.5, maskInside=False)
mask = line(points)
mask2 = line2(X)
mask3 = line3(X)
print(np.sum(mask))
print(np.sum(mask2))
print(np.sum(mask3))
assert np.all(mask == mask2)
assert np.all(mask3 == mask2)
